Package ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidNotificationCreator
    This object will be used when the DataManger finds a New Notification message for a user.
    BidDeletedNotificationFactory
    A special notification factory used to inform a user that one of their bids placed has been declined.
    Notification
    A notification object that has a Type (So the factory knows how to make the Notificatoin), a message containing pertinent information, and info about who to send to and who sent the notification.
    NotificationFactory
    Handles the creation of most notifications by using a switch block to create unique messages and send the notifications to specific users via the DataManager.
    NotificationHandler
    NotificationHandler deals with the creation of objects of the Notification Type.
    NotificationList
    A simple Variation of an ArrayList to store Notifications.
    ViewNotificationActivity
    The activity that displays Notifications in a recyclerview.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NotificationType
    A simple enumeration for the different type of notifications.
